snippet: MY DEAR R.:--While stopping at Boston for a few hours, I comply with your request to throw together some impressions and general views of the Missionary Cause, as exhibited at the recent important meeting in Portland, Maine....

byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: MY DEAR R.:--While stopping at Boston for a few hours, I comply with your request to throw together some impressions and general views of the Missionary Cause, as exhibited at the recent important meeting in Portland, Maine.

headline.main: THE MISSIONARY CAUSE; Meeting of the American Board at Portland.
